ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] refamiliarizing myself
ygData.msgSnippet: the regeant is 1 malachite per casting, doesnt matter what elemental you summon, ice of velious is used as a research regent for one of the pet spells, cant
ygData.messageBody:
the regeant is 1 malachite per casting, doesnt matter what elemental you summon, ice of velious is used as a research regent for one of the pet spells, cant remember which, prob lvl 39-44 water or some such, you can find out all the mage/necro stuff at castersrealm and of course alakazam.

Nuada.

>From: "Su"
>Reply-To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>To:
>Subject: Re: [EverQuest] refamiliarizing myself
>Date: Tue, 16 Jul 2002 08:37:44 -0500
>
>
>
> > After taking a long break from Evercrack at the Betty Ford Clinic I'm
> > back. I actually did forgat a few things and want to refamiliarize
> > myself, On the 3 bars that tell you your health and level status, I
> > forgot what the blue line is for. I know it has something to do with
> > your charma or something like that.
> >
>It's your mana bar.
> >
> > Also I just started playing with a Necro just to see what it's like. Any
> > good suggestion for getting Necro stuff? BTW I'm a Gnome.
> >
>Sorry, I've never played a necro.
> >
> > What are the elements a Magician needs to conjure up a elementa pet like
> > fire or earth? I ran out and now I can't remember what I need to get!
> > What a dummy! ;-)
> >
>I know ice of velious is one of them. I don't know on the rest.
>luv,
>-Su
